headline: The end of the road for Cloudflare CAPTCHAs
keywords: Managed Challenge, CAPTCHA, WAF, Security, Bots, Product News
description: We decided weâ€™re going to stop using CAPTCHAs. Before we talk about how we did it, and how you can help, let's first start with a simple question. Why in the world is CAPTCHA still used anyway?
